00055 ConjugateGradient::ConjugateGradient(ObjectiveFunction* objective) :
00056   VertexMover(objective),
00057   PatchSetUser(true),
00058   pMemento(NULL),
00059   conjGradDebug(0)
00060 { }  
00061 
00062 ConjugateGradient::ConjugateGradient(ObjectiveFunction* objective,
00063                                      MsqError &err) :
00064   VertexMover(objective),
00065   PatchSetUser(true),
00066   pMemento(NULL),
00067   conjGradDebug(0)
00068 {
00069     //Michael:: default to global?
00070   set_debugging_level(0);
00071     //set the default inner termination criterion
00072   TerminationCriterion* default_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00073   if(default_crit==NULL){
00074     MSQ_SETERR(err)("QualityImprover did not create a default inner "
00075                     "termination criterion.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00076     return;
00077   }
00078   else{
00079     default_crit->add_iteration_limit( 5 );
00080     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00081   }
00082   
00083 }

00086 ConjugateGradient::~ConjugateGradient()
00087 {
00088   // Checks that cleanup() has been called. 
00089   assert(pMemento==NULL);
00090 }
00091   
00092 void ConjugateGradient::initialize(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00093 {
00094   if (get_parallel_size())
00095     MSQ_DBGOUT(2) << "\nP[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] " << "o   Performing Conjugate Gradient optimization.\n";
00096   else
00097     MSQ_DBGOUT(2) << "\no   Performing Conjugate Gradient optimization.\n";
00098   pMemento=pd.create_vertices_memento(err);
00099 }

00107 
00109 void ConjugateGradient::optimize_vertex_positions(PatchData &pd, 
00110                                                 MsqError &err){
00111   // pd.reorder();
00112 
00113   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "ConjugateGradient::optimize_vertex_positions" );
00114 
00115   Timer c_timer;
00116   size_t num_vert=pd.num_free_vertices();
00117   if(num_vert<1){
00118      MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "\nEmpty free vertex list in ConjugateGradient\n";
00119      return;
00120   }
00121 /*  
00122     //zero out arrays
00123   int zero_loop=0;
00124   while(zero_loop<arraySize){
00125     fGrad[zero_loop].set(0,0,0);
00126     pGrad[zero_loop].set(0,0,0);
00127     fNewGrad[zero_loop].set(0,0,0);
00128     ++zero_loop;
00129   }
00130 */
00131   
00132   // get OF evaluator
00133   OFEvaluator& objFunc = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00134   
00135   size_t ind;
00136     //Michael cull list:  possibly set soft_fixed flags here
00137   
00138    //MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator free_iter(pd, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00139   
00140       
00141    double f=0;
00142    //Michael, this isn't equivalent to CUBIT because we only want to check
00143    //the objective function value of the 'bad' elements
00144    //if invalid initial patch set an error.
00145    bool temp_bool = objFunc.update(pd, f, fGrad, err);
00146    assert(fGrad.size() == num_vert);
00147    if(MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00148       return;
00149   if( ! temp_bool){
00150     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Conjugate Gradient not able to get valid gradient "
00151                     "and function values on intial patch.", 
00152                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00153     return;
00154   }
00155   double grad_norm=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00156   
00157   if(conjGradDebug>0){
00158     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\nCG's DEGUB LEVEL = %i \n",conjGradDebug);
00159     grad_norm=Linf(arrptr(fGrad),fGrad.size());
00160     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\nCG's FIRST VALUE = %f,grad_norm = %f",f,grad_norm);
00161     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n   TIME %f",c_timer.since_birth());
00162     grad_norm=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00163   }
00164 
00165     //Initializing pGrad (search direction).  
00166   pGrad.resize(fGrad.size());
00167   for (ind = 0; ind < num_vert; ++ind)
00168     pGrad[ind]=(-fGrad[ind]);
00169 
00170   int j=0; // total nb of step size changes ... not used much
00171   int i=0; // iteration counter
00172   unsigned m=0; // 
00173   double alp=MSQ_MAX_CAP; // alp: scale factor of search direction
00174     //we know inner_criterion is false because it was checked in
00175     //loop_over_mesh before being sent here.
00176   TerminationCriterion* term_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00177   
00178     //while ((i<maxIteration && alp>stepBound && grad_norm>normGradientBound)
00179     //     && !inner_criterion){
00180   while(!term_crit->terminate()){
00181     ++i;
00182       //std::cout<<"\Michael delete i = "<<i;
00183     int k=0;
00184     alp=get_step(pd,f,k,err);
00185     j+=k;
00186     if(conjGradDebug>2){
00187       MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n  Alp initial, alp = %20.18f",alp);
00188     }
00189 
00190      // if alp == 0, revert to steepest descent search direction
00191     if(alp==0){
00192       for (m = 0; m < num_vert; ++m) {
00193         pGrad[m]=(-fGrad[m]);
00194       }
00195       alp=get_step(pd,f,k,err);
00196       j+=k;
00197       if(conjGradDebug>1){
00198         MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n CG's search direction reset.");
00199         if(conjGradDebug>2)
00200           MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n  Alp was zero, alp = %20.18f",alp);
00201       }
00202       
00203     }
00204     if(alp!=0){
00205       pd.move_free_vertices_constrained( arrptr(pGrad), num_vert, alp, err );
00206       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00207       
00208       if (! objFunc.update(pd, f, fNewGrad, err)){
00209         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Error inside Conjugate Gradient, vertices moved "
00210                         "making function value invalid.", 
00211                         MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00212         return;
00213       }
00214       assert(fNewGrad.size() == (unsigned)num_vert);
00215       
00216       if(conjGradDebug>0){
00217         grad_norm=Linf(arrptr(fNewGrad),num_vert);
00218         MSQ_PRINT(2)("\nCG's VALUE = %f,  iter. = %i,  grad_norm = %f,  alp = %f",f,i,grad_norm,alp);
00219         MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n   TIME %f",c_timer.since_birth());
00220       }
00221       double s11=0;
00222       double s12=0;
00223       double s22=0;
00224       //free_iter.reset();
00225       //while (free_iter.next()) {
00226       //  m=free_iter.value();
00227       for (m = 0; m < num_vert; ++m) {
00228         s11+=fGrad[m]%fGrad[m];
00229         s12+=fGrad[m]%fNewGrad[m];
00230         s22+=fNewGrad[m]%fNewGrad[m];
00231       }
00232       
00233         // Steepest Descent (takes 2-3 times as long as P-R)
00234         //double bet=0;
00235       
00236         // Fletcher-Reeves (takes twice as long as P-R)
00237         //double bet = s22/s11;
00238 
00239         // Polack-Ribiere  
00240       double bet;  
00241       if (!divide( s22-s12, s11, bet ))
00242         return; // gradient is zero    
00243       //free_iter.reset();
00244       //while (free_iter.next()) {
00245       //  m=free_iter.value();
00246       for (m = 0; m < num_vert; ++m) {
00247         pGrad[m]=(-fNewGrad[m]+(bet*pGrad[m]));
00248         fGrad[m]=fNewGrad[m];
00249       }
00250       if(conjGradDebug>2){
00251         MSQ_PRINT(2)(" \nSEARCH DIRECTION INFINITY NORM = %e",
00252                    Linf(arrptr(fNewGrad),num_vert));
00253       }
00254       
00255     }//end if on alp == 0
00256 
00257     term_crit->accumulate_patch( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00258     term_crit->accumulate_inner( pd, f, arrptr(fGrad), err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00259   }//end while
00260   if(conjGradDebug>0){
00261     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\nConjugate Gradient complete i=%i ",i);
00262     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n-  FINAL value = %f, alp=%4.2e grad_norm=%4.2e",f,alp,grad_norm);
00263     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n   FINAL TIME %f",c_timer.since_birth());
00264   }
00265 }

00269                                                  MsqError &/*err*/)
00270 {
00271     //  cout << "- Executing ConjugateGradient::iteration_complete()\n";
00272 }

00274 
00275 void ConjugateGradient::cleanup()
00276 {
00277     //  cout << "- Executing ConjugateGradient::iteration_end()\n";
00278   fGrad.clear();
00279   pGrad.clear();
00280   fNewGrad.clear();
00281     //pMemento->~PatchDataVerticesMemento();
00282   delete pMemento;
00283   pMemento = NULL;
00284 }
00285 
00287 
00294 double ConjugateGradient::get_step(PatchData &pd,double f0,int &j,
00295                                    MsqError &err)
00296 {
00297   // get OF evaluator
00298   OFEvaluator& objFunc = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00299 
00300   size_t num_vertices=pd.num_free_vertices();
00301     //initial guess for alp
00302   double alp=1.0;
00303   int jmax=100;
00304   double rho=0.5;
00305     //feasible=false implies the mesh is not in the feasible region
00306   bool feasible=false;
00307   int found=0;
00308     //f and fnew hold the objective function value
00309   double f=0;
00310   double fnew=0;
00311     //Counter to avoid infinitly scaling alp
00312   j=0;
00313   //save memento
00314   pd.recreate_vertices_memento(pMemento, err);
00315     //if we must check feasiblility
00316     //while step takes mesh into infeasible region and ...
00317   while (j<jmax && !feasible && alp>MSQ_MIN) {
00318     ++j;
00319     pd.set_free_vertices_constrained(pMemento,arrptr(pGrad),num_vertices,alp,err);
00320     feasible=objFunc.evaluate(pd,f,err);
00321     if(err.error_code() == err.BARRIER_VIOLATED)
00322       err.clear();  // barrier violation does not represent an actual error here
00323     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00324       //if not feasible, try a smaller alp (take smaller step)
00325     if(!feasible){
00326       alp*=rho;
00327     }
00328   }//end while ...
00329   
00330     //if above while ended due to j>=jmax, no valid step was found.
00331   if(j>=jmax){
00332     MSQ_PRINT(2)("\nFeasible Point Not Found");
00333     return 0.0;
00334   }
00335     //Message::print_info("\nOriginal f %f, first new f = %f, alp = %f",f0,f,alp);
00336     //if new f is larger than original, our step was too large
00337   if(f>=f0){
00338     j=0;
00339     while (j<jmax && found == 0){
00340       ++j;
00341       alp *= rho;
00342       pd.set_free_vertices_constrained(pMemento,arrptr(pGrad),num_vertices,alp,err);
00343         //Get new obj value
00344         //if patch is now invalid, then the feasible region is  convex or
00345         //we have an error.  For now, we assume an error.
00346       if(! objFunc.evaluate(pd,f,err) ){
00347         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Non-convex feasiblility region found.",MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00348       }
00349       pd.set_to_vertices_memento(pMemento,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00350         //if our step has now improved the objective function value
00351       if(f<f0){
00352         found=1;
00353       }
00354     }//   end while j less than jmax
00355       //Message::print_info("\nj = %d found = %d f = %20.18f f0 = %20.18f\n",j,found,f,f0);
00356       //if above ended because of j>=jmax, take no step
00357     if(found==0){
00358         //Message::print_info("alp = %10.8f, but returning zero\n",alp);
00359       alp=0.0; 
00360       return alp;
00361     }
00362 
00363     j=0;
00364       //while shrinking the step improves the objFunc value further,
00365       //scale alp down.  Return alp, when scaling once more would
00366       //no longer improve the objFunc value.  
00367     while(j<jmax){
00368       ++j;
00369       alp*=rho;
00370       //step alp in search direction from original positions
00371       pd.set_free_vertices_constrained(pMemento,arrptr(pGrad),num_vertices,alp,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00372 
00373         //get new objective function value
00374       if (! objFunc.evaluate(pd,fnew,err))
00375         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Non-convex feasiblility region found while "
00376                         "computing new f.",MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00377       if(fnew<f){
00378         f=fnew;
00379       }
00380       else{
00381         //Reset the vertices to original position
00382         pd.set_to_vertices_memento(pMemento,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00383         alp/=rho;
00384         return alp;
00385       }
00386     }
00387     //Reset the vertices to original position and return alp
00388     pd.set_to_vertices_memento(pMemento,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00389     return alp;
00390   }
00391     //else our new f was already smaller than our original
00392   else{
00393     j=0;
00394       //check to see how large of step we can take
00395     while (j<jmax && found == 0) {
00396       ++j;
00397         //scale alp up (rho must be less than 1)
00398       alp /= rho;
00399       //step alp in search direction from original positions
00400       pd.set_free_vertices_constrained(pMemento,arrptr(pGrad),num_vertices,alp,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00401 
00402       feasible = objFunc.evaluate(pd,fnew, err);
00403       if(err.error_code() == err.BARRIER_VIOLATED)
00404         err.clear();  // evaluate() error does not represent an actual problem here
00405       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00406       if ( ! feasible ){
00407         alp *= rho;
00408           //Reset the vertices to original position and return alp
00409         pd.set_to_vertices_memento(pMemento,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00410         return alp;
00411       }
00412       if (fnew<f) { 
00413           f = fnew; 
00414        }
00415        else {
00416          found=1;
00417          alp *= rho;
00418        }
00419     }
00420 
00421     //Reset the vertices to original position and return alp
00422     pd.set_to_vertices_memento(pMemento,err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00423     return alp;
00424   }
00425 }
00426 
00428 /*
00429 double ConjugateGradient::get_step(PatchData &pd,double f0,int &j,
00430                                    MsqError &err){
00431   const double CGOLD = 0.3819660;
00432   const double ZEPS = 1.0e-10;
00433   int n=pd.num_free_vertices();
00434   MsqVertex* vertices=pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00435   double a,b,d,etemp,fb,fu,fv,fw,fx,p,q,r,tol,tol1,tol2,u,v,w,x,xm;
00436   double e=0.0;
00437   d=0.0;
00438   tol=.001;
00439   int iter, maxiter;
00440   maxiter=100;
00441   a=0;
00442   b=.125;
00443   int m=0;
00444   fb=f0-1.0;
00445   iter=0;
00446   //find b such that a b 'should' bracket the min
00447   while (fb<=f0 && iter<maxiter){
00448     ++iter;
00449     b*=2.0;
00450     for(m=0;m<n;++m){
00451       mCoord[m]=mCoord[m] + (b*pGrad[m]);
00452       vertices[m]=(mCoord[m]);
00453     }
00454     fb=objFunc->evaluate(pd,err);
00455   }
00456   iter=0;
00457   x=w=v=(b/2.0);
00458   for(m=0;m<n;++m){
00459     mCoord[m]=mCoord[m] + (x*pGrad[m]);
00460     vertices[m]=(mCoord[m]);
00461   }
00462   fw=fv=fx=objFunc->evaluate(pd,err);
00463   for(iter=0;iter<maxiter;++iter){
00464       //Message::print_info("a=%f,b=%f,x=%f,iter=%i\n",a,b,x,iter);
00465     xm=(a+b)*.5;
00466     tol2=2.0*(tol1=tol*fabs(x)+ZEPS);
00467     if(fabs(x-xm)<= (tol2-0.5*(b-a))){
00468       return x;
00469     }
00470     if(fabs(e)>tol1){
00471       r=(x-w)*(fx-fv);
00472       q=(x-v)*(fx-fw);
00473       p=(x-v)*q-(x-w)*r;
00474       q=2.0*(q-r);
00475       if(q>0.0)
00476         p=-p;
00477       q=fabs(q);
00478       etemp=e;
00479       e=d;
00480       if(fabs(p)>=fabs(0.5*q*etemp)||(p<=q*(a-x))||(p>=q*(b-x))){
00481         d=CGOLD*(e=(x>=xm?a-x:b-x));
00482       }
00483       else{
00484         d=p/q;
00485         u=x+d;
00486         if(u-a<tol2||b-u<tol2)
00487         {
00488           if(tol1<0.0)
00489             d=x-xm;
00490           else
00491             d=xm-x;
00492         }
00493       }
00494     }
00495     
00496     else{
00497       d=CGOLD*(e=(x>=xm?a-x:b-x));
00498     }
00499     if(tol<0.0)
00500       u=(fabs(d)>=tol1?x+d:x-d);
00501     else
00502       u=(fabs(d)>=tol1?x+d:x+d);
00503     for(m=0;m<n;++m){
00504       mCoord[m]=mCoord[m] + (u*pGrad[m]);
00505       vertices[m]=(mCoord[m]);
00506     }
00507     fu=objFunc->evaluate(pd,err);
00508     if(fu<fx){
00509       if(u>=x)
00510         a=x;
00511       else
00512         b=x;
00513       v=w;
00514       w=x;
00515       x=u;
00516       fv=fw;
00517       fw=fx;
00518       fx=fu;
00519     }
00520     else{
00521       if(u<x)
00522         a=u;
00523       else
00524         b=u;
00525       if(fu<=fw||w==x){
00526         v=w;
00527         w=u;
00528         fv=fw;
00529         fw=fu;
00530       }
00531       else if (fu<=fv||v==x||v==w){
00532         v=u;
00533         fv=fu;
00534       }
00535     }
00536   }
00537   for(m=0;m<n;++m){   
00538     vertices[m]=(mCoord[m]);
00539   }
00540     //PRINT_WARNING("TOO MANY ITERATIONS IN QUADRATIC LINE SEARCH");
00541   return x;
00542 }
00543 */
